document.title: Bruno's MIND CONTROL Project
document.content:
Hey!
Just finished participating in the Ludum Dare game jam where you create a game under 72 hours with a couple friends of mine.

Was super duper fun to create even though now my sleep schedule is super messy

Anyways we created a crazy game called Bruno's Mind Control Project.
You can play it here if you so choose.

Alright thanks cya later bye
